entries.text: Partners must actively 'turn toward' their partner's emotional bids at least 86% of the time (Bid Responsiveness Rule).
Schedule and maintain regular one-on-one time together (Minimum Weekly Contact Rule).
Schedule and maintain regular shared rituals (Ritual Scheduling Rule).
Schedule and maintain specific special activities (Special Activity Scheduling Rule).
Acknowledge and accommodate partner's needs for solo time (Solo Time Accommodation Rule).
Follow specific strategies to handle stress and provide support during stressful times (Stress Management Protocol).
Specifically address conflict using strategies to avoid the Four Horsemen (Conflict Resolution Rule).
Maintain a specific approach to friends and family (Friendship/Family Integration Rule).
